content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, I'm glad we're talking about the rental price. What is your offer? Remember, I'm looking for the highest possible price for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're looking for the highest possible price, Mr. Schmidt. As a student, I'm on a budget, so I'm hoping to find a reasonable offer. How about we start with 500 Euro per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's too low for me, Mr. Wang. I'm looking for a higher price. Remember, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. The apartment is close to all important facilities. I'm sure you'll understand why I can't accept such a low offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time, Mr. Schmidt, but I need to keep my expenses low as a student. How about we meet in the middle? 600 Euro per month? It's a fair compromise, I believe.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's still too low for me, Mr. Wang. I want to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. I'm sure you can understand that as a landlord, it's my goal to get the best deal for my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mr. Schmidt. As a responsible and dependable student, I'm willing to pay a fair price for a comfortable living space. How about 650 Euro per month? This is my final offer.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euro per month! Let's make this deal official. 'TERMINATE'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
